value.title: Microsoft shares down as Azure cloud-services business slows down

value.title: IBM’s Watson rebooted as a secure AI alternative
value.excerpt: IBM hopes its watsonx studio will get it back into the AI conversation. It’s last splashy foray, Watson, was once billed as AI breakthrough for healthcare, accounting, cybersecurity and for beating Jeopardy! superstars like Ken Jennings. Today, as its lower-case “w” suggests, IBM’s moonshot ambitions have been scuttled, for now.
